content.question: In context, the sentence in lines 9-10 (“Asking these . . . art”) can best be understood as

choices.label: a reason for adopting a particular way of studying the Declaration
a challenge to commonly held ideas about the role of the Declaration in American history
a confirmation of the author’s assumption that Americans are unfamiliar with the Declaration
a possible objection from Declaration scholars who resist textual analysis

content.answer: a reason for adopting a particular way of studying the Declaration

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
